articles.title: UPS Volume Outlook Improves Modestly in Bank of America Update
articles.mainIdea: UPS Volume Outlook Improves Modestly in Bank of America Update
articles.summary: Insider Monkey: UPS Volume Outlook Improves Modestly in Bank of America Update. United Parcel Service, Inc. (NYSE:UPS) is included among the Best Stocks for a Dividend Achievers List. On December 18, Bank of America analyst Ken Hoexter raised the firm’s price target on United Parcel Service, Inc. (NYSE:UPS) to $99 from $95. The firm kept an Underperform rating on the shares.UPS told investors that peak season unfolded largely […] Related tickers mentioned: UPS.

articles.title: Wells Fargo Eyes Options Clearing to Strengthen Wall Street Footprint
articles.mainIdea: Wells Fargo Eyes Options Clearing to Strengthen Wall Street Footprint
articles.summary: Zacks: Wells Fargo Eyes Options Clearing to Strengthen Wall Street Footprint. WFC plans to enter options clearing as client demand rises, enabled by the lifted asset cap, with market makers targeted for 2H26. Related tickers mentioned: GS, WFC.
